abstract: The Port Authority ushers in a new executive director, as it bids farewell to another.
snippet: The Port Authority ushers in a new executive director, as it bids farewell to another.
lead_paragraph: The Board of Commissioners of the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey on Thursday unanimously approved the appointment of Patrick J. Foye, to become the agency's new executive director.

headline.main: New Leader Approved by Port Authority
